#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<string.h>

using namespace std;


int main(){
int t;
cin>>t;
while(t--){
    int n;
    int length[11111];
    int dif[11111];
    cin>>n;
    dif[0]=0;
    int ans=0;
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
        cin>>length[i];
        if(i>0){
            dif[i]=length[i]-length[i-1];
        }
        if(dif[i]>0)ans++;
    }
    cout<<ans<<endl;
}}
